description: Created from Asset Administration Shell DTDL model
title: Asset Administration Shell
$comment: According Platform Industrie 4.0. Details of Asset Administration Shell (Version 3.0) Part 1 Release Candidate 02

links.dtdl:description: The reference to the AAS the AAS was derived from.
Meta information about the asset the AAS is representing

Reference to a submodel of the AAS. A submodel is a description of an aspect of the asset the AAS is representing. The asset of an AAS is typically described by one or more submodels. Temporarily no submodel might be assigned to the AAS.

links.dtdl:name: assetInformationShort
links.dtdl:description: Meta information about the asset the AAS is representing
